response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to sell this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1,300,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between our respective valuations, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you decide to proceed, I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing immense value and satisfaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product, and I would be delighted to assist you. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1300000}
